testcase.name: Complete Checkout Process
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the Saucedemo login page......................................passed When I login with username "standard_user" and password "secret_sauce"......passed Given I am on the Products page.............................................passed When I add following items to cart..........................................passed And I click the cart button.................................................passed Then I should be on the cart page...........................................passed Then I should see the selected items in cart................................passed When I click the Checkout button............................................passed Then I should be on the checkout:your information page......................passed And I enter customer information............................................passed And I click continue........................................................passed Then I should be on Checkout :overview page.................................passed And I click finish button...................................................passed Then I should be on Checkout: complete page.................................passed And I click back home button................................................passed Then I should be on Product page again......................................passed
